thread.title: Jemma Lucy gets naked as Margot Robbie's Suicide Squad character Harley Quinn and it's pretty x-rated
thread.title_full: Jemma Lucy gets naked as Margot Robbie's Suicide Squad character Harley Quinn and it's pretty x-rated

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Jemma Lucy gets naked as Margot Robbie's Suicide Squad character Harley Quinn and it's pretty x-rated
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jemma Lucy has paid homage to Margot Robbie's Suicide Squad character by dressing up as a porny version of baddie Harley Quinn. 
The former Ex On The Beach contestant recreated the look beloved of many a Halloween party in 2016 for Front magazine, but with much less clothing in some shots and absolutely none at all in others as she channelled The Joker's accomplice. 
In the shoot, Jemma holds a gun between her legs, covers her bits with a range of weapons including a baseball bat and a golden gun, and generally does some posing and it's all a bit sexual. Jemma recreated the character of Harley Quinn for Front magazine (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) A nipple-covering baseball bat (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) She looks pretty happy to be having a clothed shower (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) Jemma holds a gun in the x-rated photos (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) Jemma forgot to put her pants on (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) Jemma, mostly clothed (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) Jemma covering her bits with a firearm (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) Jemma and her baseball bat (Photo: XPOSURE.COM) 
Earlier this week, Jemma revealed that someone had reported one of the racy Harley Quinn pictures she'd posted to Instagram. 
"SHOCK SOMEONE REPORTED MY COVER PIC" she wrote beside a screen shot of the interview, and directed fans to download the magazine. 
She revealed in the interview that she's keen to take part in a proper boxing match - and not for the cameras. 
"I've got so into it and just want to be the absolute best which is my attitude to everything I do," she told FRONT. "So yeah, I'm going to have a fight but not as some publicity stunt." 
On Monday, Jemma went under the knife to enlarge her G cup boobs, and celebrated the operation - her second enlargement - by doing a striptease in a hospital gown and a pair of paper pants. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
